DOC.brief_summary: Ulinastatin reduce the amount of bleeding and fibrinolysis in high risk patients undergoing off-pump coronary bypass surgery (OPCAB).
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Ulinastatin on Coagulation in High Risk Patients Undergoing Off Pump Coronary Artery Bypass Graft Surgery
DOC.criteria: Eighty high risk patients undergoing OPCAB (High risk patients: Euro score ≥ 6 , acute coronary syndrome, preoperative CKMB increased over 5 times than normal value and high sensitivity CRP ≥2.0) The patients who receive additional operations, the patients who don't agree to participate in this trial, the patients who has a past hypersensitive experience on Ulinastatin
